abstract: American and Cuban representatives meet at conference center in Havana as part of effort to re-establish normal relations between the two countries; spend most of meeting, first of its kind since 1977, discussing logistics of opening embassies.
lead_paragraph: The sides met for several hours, mostly to iron out technical issues in converting their diplomatic outposts into full-fledged embassies.
snippet: The sides met for several hours, mostly to iron out technical issues in converting their diplomatic outposts into full-fledged embassies.

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject

headline.main: Conflict, and Smiles, as U.S. and Cuba Discuss Ties
headline.print_headline: Conflict, and Smiles, as U.S. and Cuba Discuss Ties
